content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to your liking. As for the rental price, I'm open to negotiating. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 1000 Euros per month for the apartment. Is that acceptable to you?

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I apologize, but I cannot accept that rental price. I am looking for a higher price to maximize my gains. Is there any room for negotiation on your part?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm sorry, I cannot afford to pay more than 1000 Euros per month. Is there any other option you can suggest?

TERMINATE
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I understand your situation, but I'm afraid I cannot accept that rental price. I am looking for a higher price to maximize my gains. Is there anything else you can offer that would be more acceptable to me?
name: Heinrich Heine
